original_text: When a man and a woman have married each other, they must each respect the marriage. Husbands and wives must only have sex with each other. God will punish anyone who has sex with another person's husband or wife. He will punish anyone who has sex in a wrong way.
korean_text: 모든 사람은 결혼을 귀히 여기고 침소를 더럽히지 않게 하라 음행하는 자들과 간음하는 자들을 하나님이 심판하시리라

sentences.original_text: When a man and a woman have married each other
sentences.korean_translation: 한 남자와 한 여자가 서로 결혼했을 때

sentences.original_text: they must each respect the marriage
Husbands and wives must only have sex with each other
sentences.korean_translation: 남편과 아내는 오직 서로만 성관계를 가져야 합니다

sentences.original_text: God will punish anyone who has sex with another person's husband or wife
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님은 다른 사람의 남편이나 아내와 성관계를 가진 사람을 벌하실 것입니다

sentences.original_text: He will punish anyone who has sex in a wrong way
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 잘못된 방식으로 성관계를 가진 사람을 벌하실 것입니다
